title.rendered: Congratulations Daniel P Quinn for “Subliminal” in Italy and American Phantasmagoria in Japan by Film Freeway

content.rendered:
Congratulations!


Subliminal has been officially selected at 8 & HalFilm Awards.

Congratulations from Italy and Japan for Daniel P Quinn on Film Freeway !


Subliminal has been officially selected at 8 & HalFilm Awards in Italy (12/23).”

— Film Freeway

WOODBRDFGE, NJ, USA, December 11, 2023 /EINPresswire.com/ — Congratulations from Italy and Japan for Daniel P Quinn on Film Freeway

Subliminal has been officially selected at 8 & HalFilm Awards in Italy (12/23).

Newark, Italy and me (Lulu.com) won 6 Awards on Film Freeway.

﻿Now on sale on the web or Independent Bookstore.

Newark, Italy + me / Daniel P. Quinn. — Nascent Newark —

The dawn of Newark’s Little Italy (1885-2018) — Presidential history in Newark — Gustav Bourglan’s Newark as prototype for Mount Rushmore — Arshile Gorky’s commission at Newark Airport — The Morris Canal became Raymond Boulevard — Quintet for Newark [poem] — A Newark reflection (1967-2017) — Alexander, Paterson, and Lyons, France [poem] — Let’s meet Paterson’s sister, Lyons, France — Cuinn banned by Victoria [poem] — Pabst beer and Hoffman soda — Metropolitan Opera star Maria Jeritza (1888-1982) was music history in Newark — Symphony Hall was originally named the Mosque Theatre — Newark in the age of Trump on Trump listening to Beethoven in Europe — Louis Bamberger and my family history (1927 to 2003) — Newark as insurance mecca (1845-2018) — Broadway “Grand Guignol” featuring Vincent Price & Edgar Allan Poe — Mies van der Rohe’s presence endures (1962-2018) in Century 21 — Newark coming back (2000-18).

Newark, Italy + Me.

By Daniel P Quinn

Naples Film Awards

Italy, Newark (Nevarca) and me 1883-2018.

September 10, 2023

Award Winner

Sweet Democracy Film Awards

Italy, Newark (Nevarca) and me 1883-2018.

February 9, 2023

Award Winner

Fellini Film Festival

Italy, Newark (Nevarca) and me 1883-2018.

March 6, 2023

Award Winner

Roma Short Film Festival

Italy, Newark (Nevarca) and me 1883-2018.

December 5, 2022

Award Winner

View this Author’s Spotlight

Paperback, 44 Pages

Preview

Price: $24.95

Daniel P Quinn also wrote: “Exits + Entrances, 25 years off-Broadway, Opera and Beyond”; Short Plays to Long Remember; “organized labor” (AuthorHouse.com). These books are for sale at Lulu.com; AuthorHouse.com)

Sergio Basso
ArtsPRunlimited, Inc
+1 973-482-0747
email us here

You just read:

News Provided By

December 11, 2023, 18:56 GMT
